post.text: UNBELIEVABLE MICHIGAN! I want to thank you for your support tonight -- the energy was absolutely incredible. If you all get out to vote on 11/8/2016 --- there is no question we will WIN MICHIGAN! I love this country - and I love you all. Thank you!

comment.author: Raini
comment.text: Trump, you are a friggin child. Only a 12 year old goes on Twitter in the wee hours of the morning to insult people. President? You shouldn't even be left alone without supervision.

replies.author: Alyssa
replies.text: at least he was up at 3am he would have gotten the benghazi call, but i agree no tweeting
